meanings.definition: To wire or equip in advance.
meanings.sent1: I will prewire the new house before we move in.
meanings.sent2: The electrician prewired the entire building for the upcoming renovations.
meanings.sent3: The clever homeowner decided to prewire the garden lights to surprise guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: She prewired her mind with positive thoughts before the important presentation.
meanings.sent5: The detective prewired the room with hidden cameras to catch the suspect in the act.

meanings.definition: The act of wiring or equipping in advance.
meanings.sent1: The prewiring of the security system saved us a lot of time during installation.
meanings.sent2: We discovered that the prewiring of the speakers was done incorrectly.
meanings.sent3: The prewiring of the playground equipment made the children's faces light up with joy.
meanings.sent4: The prewiring of the network cables formed the backbone of the entire communication system.
meanings.sent5: The prewiring of the stage lights created a magical atmosphere for the performance.
